snippet: The Times publisher made an immense contribution to free speech and an independent press.
abstract: Editorial extolls Arthur Ochs Sulzberger, former publisher of The New York Times, and the way in which he battled against government censorship and intimidation; reflects on immense contribution Sulzberger made to free speech and an independent press.
lead_paragraph: The Times publisher made an immense contribution to free speech and an independent press.
